overview:

Know about Furniture @ MAVENSâ€™ planet

MAVENSâ€™ planet team brings forth their latest collections of stylish, trendy, handcrafted wood and metal furniture to suit all your needs.

Furniture is the mass noun for the movable objects intended to support various human activities such as seating and sleeping in beds, to hold objects at a convenient height for work using horizontal surfaces above the ground, or to store things. Furniture offered by MAVENSâ€™ planet is a special product of design and is considered a form of decorative art. In addition to furniture’s functional role, it can serve a symbolic or religious purpose. Domestic furniture works to create, in conjunction with furnishings such as clocks and lighting, comfortable and convenient interior spaces. Furniture can be made from many materials, including metal and wood; as strength from India. Furniture can be made using a variety of woodworking joints which often reflect the local culture.

For sure, the furniture photos cannot do justice to the beauty, quality and handcraftsmanship inherent in our pieces. The weight, the scale, the sturdiness, the hand of each piece attests to the fact that behind each offering i.e. the furniture piece is a passionate craftsman from India. If you are searching for the best made furniture in the industry; be it the Living room furniture, Dining Room furniture, Dressing room furniture, Guest room furniture, Bedroom furniture, Outdoor furniture, Kitchen furniture, Backyard furniture, Kids Furniture, Classroom furniture, Lawn furniture, Office furniture, Bathroom furniture or, the Patio furniture; you need not look further. Solid Wood Furniture is known from India across the globe. Our Passion is what best captures our fascination and obsession with innovative, high-quality design with Ecoâ€”friendly solid wood furniture. Be it the Mango wood, Sheesham wood or Pine wood furniture; the majority of products and designs are created by the talented artisans of Rajasthan, India.

Different woods are the palette of the furniture maker. They provide color and texture, strength and beauty to handmade furniture. Each type of wood has characteristics to be considered when building a piece of furniture. Mango wood is a hard, dense wood which is made into a variety of arts, crafts, vases, bowls and furniture. For mango wood to be long lasting it needs to be properly seasoned and kiln dried, preferably to the same humidity level as its destination. Mango wood displays color properties unlike most other woods, it has green, brown and yellow hues. Mango wood vases and bowls show the best coloring and texture as the different carving and cut strokes reveal more diverse ranges of grain.

Sheesham Wood is also known as Indian Rosewood and is a rich medium brown wood with deep grains. It is a fast-growing hardwoods and the functional furniture made from it can deal with everyday stresses and strains without losing its attractive appearance. It is highly durable, easily carved and is exclusively used for making big furniture pieces, particularly beds, almirahs and cabinets.

Pine wood is known to be quite a flexible style of wood which makes it as one of the well-known material when it comes to producing different varieties of furniture â€“ from bedroom furniture to garden fixtures. These furniture pieces constructed from pine wood may be in forms of kitchen tables and seats â€“ both for inside your home and outside the house. They may also be curio cabinets, racks, bed frames and bedside tables. There isn’t a constraint to what home furniture can be created out of pine because of its unique resilience and overall flexibility. Pine-made furnishings can definitely contribute highlight to every dull home that you have it inside your homes. It can even liven up the surrounding making it a more relaxing and much more cozy space to anyone who goes inside your home.

When shopping pine furniture, it’s best to take a look at it first before having it final decision. Since home furniture crafted from pine are easily scratched or dented, always check out each and every fragment of home furniture for damages that will make your household furniture less durable; as suggested by MAVENSâ€™ design team.

Further, the material used for Outdoor furniture, Garden furniture, Lawn furniture, Patio furniture is definitely not solid wood but the various metals such as Iron, Steel and Aluminium. There is NO scarcity of finishes available for metal furniture as well. India is known for handcrafted products and the varied finishes offered by the craftsmen are unique, stylish and trendy.

MAVENSâ€™ design team further suggests some tips and tricks while buying furnitureâ€¦.. When choosing home furniture accessories, often seems as though you have too many choices. This often leaves many people frustrated, wondering which items to choose and which items to pass up. Obviously, the best way to learn how certain home furniture accessories would best look displayed in a room is to view pictures. Attending furniture shows and interior design exhibits may also help.

The furniture products such as bed, dining table, chairs, desks, side tables, coffee table, benches, storage, closets, almirahs, etc. are some of the very common accessory that might be displayed in just about any room in the home. Of course, as you plan your home & furniture scheme, you may also gain inspiration from friends, family, or acquaintances. Those who have an eye for interior design might be especially helpful to you. Also, keep in mind that the number of home & furniture items mentioned above is an extremely limited selection of items available; the list is really extensive

Modern furniture has a definite character. Of course, this doesnâ€™t help you much unless you review the below uncomplicated furniture decoration tips as given below:

  • Calculate the essential measurements and devise a checklist of all essential items before you shop. This reduces the possibility that the decor or furniture you select would not sit right in a given space, ensuring you do not order or purchase items that are too large or too small.
  • To create a look that is pleasing, attractive and elegant, be certain that you have general idea of the colour and arrangements you would desire decorate each room prior to purchasing any furniture or accessories.
  • If you want to make a strong statement, seek some of the more daring, futuristic and outlandish furniture pieces as you shop.
  • Whether you plan to decorate your home for the first time or again and again with new furniture; make it a priority to look at many of the budget modern furniture items.
  • In lieu of investing vast sums of money on employing an interior decorator or other creative professional, take time to do some extensive research on your own on various types of furniture available in market.
  • If you desire to accessorize, modern abstract paintings composed of colours that coordinate with the overall dÃ©cor scheme of a room are a very wise choice.
  • While fine-tuning your whole room display, beware that placing too many extra items in a room can monopolize free living space. The space should look attractive, but still remain as comfortable of a place as possible. Donâ€™t make it a tourist place.
  • If you only have a limited sum of money to invest in furniture remember that it is perfectly acceptable to shop discount stores.
  • To create an even more special touch, you can think of having artistic lighting. In many households, people prefer to place a sculpted chandelier, contemporary lamp, or colored lights in a room.
  • To make the rooms of your home stand out more, one suggestion would be to paint the walls with bright colours. Then, place modern furniture of contrasting colours in the appropriate spaces.

When choosing home furniture, almost all people are skilfully meticulous, and they have a right to be. After all, it is their money they are spending on furniture; for which they have worked very hard to earn. They want to find the best bargain while making sure they are able to find as stylish furniture pieces as possible. With above tips on furniture, It is time for you to get started on your most recent home decoration project by selecting the most stylish, durable & elegant furniture.
